alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued October 01 at 6:47AM CDT until October 01 at 11:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 11 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one quarter mile or less in dense fog. * WHERE...In Minnesota, Southern Lake and Carlton and South St. Louis Counties. In Wisconsin, Douglas, Bayfield and Ashland Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Bad River Reservation, the Fond du Lac Band and the Red Cliff Band. * WHEN...Until 11 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Southern Lake, North Shore
